name: Plant Girl
description:
Plant girl is my project for the 4fun Jam with the theme being  "Garden"

The goal of this game is to make money selling crops and upgrading perks to help you earn faster. So, basically just get rich!

To till soil you must have seeds. When you do have seeds stand on the grass and click "E" to  till the ground

Click "Q" to choose between corn and berries, and then click "E" again to plant.

Once the plant is fully grown, stand on it, and click "E" to harvest it!

To sell your crops or buy seeds/ upgrades go to the merchant on the left and click "F"

Enjoy!

Instructions for download:
1. Download the zip file
2. Unzip the file
3. Open the exe
4. Enjoy!
